attributes.additional_details: They will make this go ahead because I am not being the only year not to have a prom. Like I said i’ve planned this since I was very young and now it’s cancelled.
attributes.background: Let us have our our prom , everything with the COVID-19 has gone out of proportion, our prom isn’t till June. I’ve been planning my prom since i was six, this will go ahead!

rejection.details:
The arrangements for proms and similar events are a matter for individual educational institutions or other organisers, not the Government or Parliament.

The Government has banned all gatherings of more than two people in public, so you could start a new petition calling on the Government to end the prohibition on public gatherings of more than two people, to allow events such as proms to go ahead.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
